title: Remove NSTextView extension hack
description:
Remove global NSTextView extension that overrides frame (ContentView.swift:11-18).

## Problem
Overrides frame on ALL NSTextView instances - code smell.

## Solution
Use .scrollContentBackground(.hidden) modifier (macOS 13+).

title: Replace NSViewRepresentable DropdownMenuView with SwiftUI Menu
Replace manual UserDefaults with @AppStorage
description:
Eliminate TextManager.swift entirely by using @AppStorage directly in views.

## Current
TextManager.swift wraps UserDefaults for a single 'text' property.

## Target
Delete TextManager.swift. In ContentView, replace:
```swift
@ObservedObject var textManager = TextManager()
// usage: textManager.text
```
With:
```swift
@AppStorage("text") private var text: String = ""
// usage: text directly
```

## Note
ThemeManager stays - it has actual logic. Only TextManager is eliminated.

title: Fix deprecated APIs
description:
Update deprecated API usages.

## Step 1: Explore
Search for deprecated APIs including:
- .animation() without value parameter
- .cornerRadius()
- PreviewProvider protocol

## Step 2: Update

- .cornerRadius() → .clipShape(RoundedRectangle())
- PreviewProvider → #Preview macro
